programme.title: Spinster
Stara panna
Spinster
programme.desc:
Spinster: Directed by Andrea Dorfman. With Chelsea Peretti, Susan Kent, Nadia Tonen, Kate Lynch. After her partner breaks up with her on her 39th birthday, Gaby tackles her fears of loneliness as well as preconceptions of what it means for a woman to be single." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8452136/","name":"Spinster","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNzEyNTQtMWUxMC00MmZlLTllYzgtNDllN2I4Zjk0ZWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzgyNzIwNzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After her partner breaks up with her on her 39th birthday, Gaby tackles her fears of loneliness as well as preconceptions of what it means for a woman to be single.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8452136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnobReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"An easy-going, decent comedy.","reviewBody":"Thankfully for Chelsea Peretti's committed performance, "Spinster" succeeds at being different than most rom-com's even though it's script could've used some re-working.

In this comedy, after her boyfriend breaks up with her on her birthday, a woman tackles her fears of loneliness and what it means to be single.

An easy-going and sometimes funny film that really showcases Peretti's acting chops. I did feel as though "Spinster" lagged at some points and wondered if scenes could've been altered or re-worked. Some of the jokes didn't land as you'd expect them too but it's still a decent enough film to get through on a gloomy evening.

programme.title: Die Goldfische
Złote rybki
Die Goldfische
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietl. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1630,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7689310, Title: Die Goldfische, --- Description: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietl. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp","dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Baby Done
programme.desc: Baby Done: Directed by Curtis Vowell. With Rose Matafeo, Matthew Lewis, Emily Barclay, Rachel House. Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9894660/","name":"Baby Done","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUwMTEwYTQtYmUyNy00ZThjLWE5ZjAtZWMwZWRlNDc3Y2MzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTExNDQ2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9894660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"root_king"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting","reviewBody":"Interesting film, Unique but Nothing remarkable tho.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":993,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"pregnant,overalls","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2955985177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Zoe (Rose Matafeo) and Tim (Matthew Lewis) find out they are having a baby, they resolve to not let parenthood change them. Tim runs towards being a dad, while Zoe runs away from being a mum. Terrified that her life won't be her own anymore, Zoe is still determined to tick off a list of their wildest dreams before the baby arrives. Zoe's increasing denial about her impending birth pushes her, and her relationship, to the limit. BABY DONE is a semi-autobiographical story inspired by the filmmakers' own reaction to starting a family."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4194124/","name":"Rose Matafeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0507535/","name":"Matthew Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120593/","name":"Emily Barclay"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3555793/","name":"Curtis Vowell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3089836/","name":"Sophie Henderson"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
Siedmiu wspaniałych
The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc:
The Magnificent Seven: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio. Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404435/","name":"The Magnificent Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc0NTAyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk1ODA5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404435/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drjgardner"},"dateCreated":"2016-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The OK 7","reviewBody":"Come on now. If you're going to re-make "The Magnificent 7" let's do it magnificently. Where was that great music? Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368074/","name":"Shinobu Hashimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644823/","name":"Hideo Oguni"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368074/","name":"Shinobu Hashimoto","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644823/","name":"Hideo Oguni"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Un ange
Anioł
Un Ange
programme.desc:
Un ange: Directed by Koen Mortier. With Fatou N'Diaye, Vincent Rottiers, Paul Bartel, Aïcha Cissé. Un Ange follows the encounter of a prostitute, Fae, and a world-famous athlete, Thierry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6318728/","name":"Un ange","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg2YzUyYzQtODA2MC00OTYxLWJhYTktMjU2NzE3NzFkYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg3MjczODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Un Ange follows the encounter of a prostitute, Fae, and a world-famous athlete, Thierry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6318728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mamabadger56"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grim but beautiful","reviewBody":"Angel is a love story, but a highly unusual one. It tells two stories at once: the literal, real life actions of its two protagonists, which are for the most part sordid and self-destructive; and the unseen reality of the love between them, and their incredibly unlikely yet firmly held hopes for the future. 

Fae is a young prostitute in Dakar, Senegal. She retains her self-respect and optimism by refusing to identify herself as a whore; she insists, half-jokingly, "I'm not a prostitute; I'm a gazelle!" She even refuses to carry the mandatory state "health card" which identifies the bearer as a registered prostitute, rejecting all such labels even at the risk of legal trouble. She keeps herself neat and clean, chooses her clients carefully, and avoids the usual traps of drugs and depression. Her efforts and her hopefulness are touching, especially against the backdrop of the realities of her degrading and dangerous profession; she and her colleagues joke casually about dying young.

Thierry is, or has been, a star bicycle racer from Belgium, who has taken some time off after a racing mishap, and come to Dakar for a vacation. It gradually becomes clear that Thierry is not doing well: he is not only verging on depression, but is developing a serious drug addiction that may end his athletic career. His trip to Senegal is mainly for the purpose of a drug and alcohol binge. There are hints of self-destructiveness in his behaviour.

When Thierry and Fae meet, it is love at first sight, the Romeo and Juliet quality of their instant connection contrasting sharply with the squalid circumstances: Fae is at a bar looking for customers, and Thierry, at his friend's urging, picks her up. They spend the evening together, dancing, talking, going for a walk. The outward reality is that of a tourist partying with a local prostitute he has hired for the night. The deeper reality of their bond is delicately expressed through several means: surreal visual imagery, the voice-over narration of Fae's inner voice, or sometimes by words or expressions from the couple which show they both feel, at some level, the significance of their meeting. Light and colour are used creatively to set the tone of each scene.

As the night wears on, Thierry and Fae grow closer, but begin to encounter obstacles, at first from their surroundings, the attitudes of others, and from legal issues, but eventually from Thierry's unstable condition as well. Even the confident Fae is inhibited to some extent by her awareness of her status as a prostitute, and this becomes an additional impediment. The story becomes one of struggle between an unlikely, socially unthinkable love, and the outward obstacles and inner demons trying to thwart it. 

The acting, by the lovely Fatou N'Diaye as Fae, and Vincent Rottiers as Thierry, is understated but excellent. The content, it should be mentioned, is dark and often graphic, and not for the sensitive; but the very bleak and sometimes gruesome story is told in an imaginative and unconventional way that makes the film interesting and worthwhile.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":374,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-09-19","keywords":"female nudity,topless female nudity,shower,bicycle,cyclist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angel","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi873644057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE0MTc3MDktZmRkMy00YWRiLWE3NDUtNTE2YjA3ZjJjZGVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE0MTc3MDktZmRkMy00YWRiLWE3NDUtNTE2YjA3ZjJjZGVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0618456/","name":"Fatou N'Diaye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196219/","name":"Vincent Rottiers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4080592/","name":"Paul Bartel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607831/","name":"Koen Mortier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0181156/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098159/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607831/","name":"Koen Mortier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2329684/","name":"Dimitri Verhulst"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quello che non sai di me: WT
To, czego o mnie nie wiesz
Quello che non sai di me
programme.desc: Quello che non sai di me: WT: Directed by Rolando Colla. With Francesco Cortopassi, Sara D'Amario, Cristian Izzo, Alfie Nze. Patricia and Ikendu meet in a town in Italian-speaking Switzerland. He comes from Mali, she's employed and the single mother of two daughters. He keeps silent about the reasons for his flight, but he's a fantastic cook and brings warmth and stability into the chaos that is Patricia's life. After their wedding, they live a carefree life, without asking each other too many questions. But one day, Ikendu is arrested and incriminated as a drug dealer by his co-defendants. Now, a difficult period begins for the couple. They both find out things they had previously hidden from one another. At times, this leaves them speechless, at others it causes violent arguments. They often don't understand the world any longer. Nonetheless their relationship takes an important step forward." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7805896/","name":"Quello che non sai di me: WT","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFkODhlNTctMDRlMy00ZjlkLThlZjQtNWMwNzk4YWE1OWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Patricia and Ikendu meet in a town in Italian-speaking Switzerland. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9894660/","name":"Baby Done","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUwMTEwYTQtYmUyNy00ZThjLWE5ZjAtZWMwZWRlNDc3Y2MzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTExNDQ2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9894660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"root_king"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting","reviewBody":"Interesting film, Unique but Nothing remarkable tho.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":993,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"pregnant,overalls","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2955985177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Zoe (Rose Matafeo) and Tim (Matthew Lewis) find out they are having a baby, they resolve to not let parenthood change them. Tim runs towards being a dad, while Zoe runs away from being a mum. Terrified that her life won't be her own anymore, Zoe is still determined to tick off a list of their wildest dreams before the baby arrives. Zoe's increasing denial about her impending birth pushes her, and her relationship, to the limit. BABY DONE is a semi-autobiographical story inspired by the filmmakers' own reaction to starting a family."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4194124/","name":"Rose Matafeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0507535/","name":"Matthew Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120593/","name":"Emily Barclay"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3555793/","name":"Curtis Vowell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3089836/","name":"Sophie Henderson"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Zoe's increasing denial about her impending birth pushes her, and her relationship, to the limit. programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
Siedmiu wspaniałych
The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc:
The Magnificent Seven: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio. Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404435/","name":"The Magnificent Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc0NTAyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk1ODA5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404435/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drjgardner"},"dateCreated":"2016-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The OK 7","reviewBody":"Come on now. If you're going to re-make "The Magnificent 7" let's do it magnificently. Where was that great music? Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368074/","name":"Shinobu Hashimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644823/","name":"Hideo Oguni"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2404435, Title: The Magnificent Seven, --- Description: The Magnificent Seven: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio. Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404435/","name":"The Magnificent Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc0NTAyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk1ODA5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404435/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"drjgardner","dateCreated":"2016-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The OK 7","reviewBody":"Come on now. If you're going to re-make "The Magnificent 7" let's do it magnificently. Where was that great music? Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368074/","name":"Shinobu Hashimoto","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644823/","name":"Hideo Oguni"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Canción sin nombre
Piosenka bez tytułu
Canción sin nombre
programme.desc: Canción sin nombre: Directed by Melina León. With Pamela Mendoza, Tommy Párraga, Lucio Rojas, Ruth Armas. Georgina's newborn daughter is stolen at a fake health clinic. Her desperate search for the child leads her to the headquarters of a major newspaper, where she meets a lonely journalist who takes on the investigation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1824932/","name":"Canción sin nombre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNkNWJhMTctZjBjNC00ZDQ2LTk5MjYtMDRmNDdlYTEyNTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc5OTQwMzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Georgina's newborn daughter is stolen at a fake health clinic. Her desperate search for the child leads her to the headquarters of a major newspaper, where she meets a lonely journalist who takes on the investigation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1824932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pixelcrash3"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Refined","reviewBody":"Elegantly directed in B&W square format with an elegiac style that mixes Theo Angelopoulos' static poetry with Alfonso Cuarón's shifting landscapes (particularly those of Roma), Song Without a Name unfolds three parallel plots: the kidnapping of Georgina's baby, Pedro's homosexual affair with Isa, and the burgeoning terrorism in late 1980s Peru (in which Georgina's husband is involved). What unites the three stories is Peru itself and its internal conflicts, amid which the protagonists find themselves cast away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":835,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-01-23","keywords":"journalist,title directed by female,f rated,triple f rated,peru","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi548192537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUwYzllNjMtZDQ5MC00YmI5LTlhMmMtNzVlNmY5ZDY2NjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUwYzllNjMtZDQ5MC00YmI5LTlhMmMtNzVlNmY5ZDY2NjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10135530/","name":"Pamela Mendoza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2742049/","name":"Tommy Párraga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10135533/","name":"Lucio Rojas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1383771/","name":"Melina León"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0654436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0749780/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0149598/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1383771/","name":"Melina León"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4377792/","name":"Michael J. programme.title: Hvítur, hvítur dagur
Biały, biały dzień
Hvítur, Hvítur Dagur
programme.desc:
Hvítur, hvítur dagur: Directed by Hlynur Pálmason. With Ingvar Sigurdsson, Ída Mekkín Hlynsdóttir, Hilmir Snær Guðnason, Sara Dögg Ásgeirsdóttir. An off duty police begins to suspect a local man for having had an affair with his recently dead wife. Gradually his obsession for finding out the truth accumulates and inevitably begins to endanger himself and his loved ones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9801736/","name":"Hvítur, hvítur dagur","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFkNzk2ZDQtZTQ0OS00NjVmLTgxY2QtZmJkMjI4ZThiZmYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An off duty police begins to suspect a local man for having had an affair with his recently dead wife. Gradually his obsession for finding out the truth accumulates and inevitably begins to endanger himself and his loved ones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9801736/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lepidopterous_"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"A reconciliation of purity and humanity through memory and grief","reviewBody":""For some reason, she was always enough for me."

Hvíter Hvíter Dager, Iceland's Oscar entry for Best Foreign Film this year, is a quiet, mature look at grief and memory. It is about a man who carries within him a love so pure, he struggles to understand anything else. It is about refusing to let go of the version of someone you want to hold onto forever.

The narrative slowly unravels like a novel as themes are explored through nuance and metaphor. The delicate dealing with love lost recalls Lee Chang-dong's Secret Sunshine and Céline Sciamma's Portrait de La Jeune Fille en Feu, regarding the myth of Orpheus and Eurydice. The cinematography, shot in a noticeably textured 35mm, is peculiar in the way it involves the setting and keeps us a certain physical distance from the characters. I think Michael Haneke would be proud of this film.

The central character Ingimunder's relationship with his granddaughter Salka serves the film in predictable but endearing ways. Strong child acting is often taken for granted, but Ída Mekkín Hlynsdóttir's performance is far from typical. It is also a testament to both fine direction (Hlynur Palmason) and strong casting because the two leads are almost irreplaceable and truly contribute to make the film something special.

A White, White Day is enriched by its simplicity and singularity as it takes on heavy themes. The characters are real, the story is thoughtfully restrained, and the ending is remarkable. One of the more memorable films of the year.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-09-06","keywords":"female frontal nudity,male nudity,female nudity,male rear nudity,male frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A White, White Day","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi306495257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBjZDI5MjktZTFlOC00MjJkLWI1ZGEtOTAwODZlNWY4NWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjBjZDI5MjktZTFlOC00MjJkLWI1ZGEtOTAwODZlNWY4NWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797614/","name":"Ingvar Sigurdsson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10588371/","name":"Ída Mekkín Hlynsdóttir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350273/","name":"Hilmir Snær Guðnason"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6249843/","name":"Hlynur Pálmason"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0404626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6249843/","name":"Hlynur Pálmason"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Richard Jewell: Directed by Clint Eastwood. With Paul Walter Hauser, Sam Rockwell, Brandon Stanley, Ryan Boz. Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3513548/","name":"Richard Jewell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTFlODg1MTEtZTJhOC00OTY1LWE0YzctZjRlODdkYWY5ZDM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU1NzU3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3513548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"try these shoes on","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. Imagine you are being falsely accused of a terrorist act that killed and injured people. You are the FBI's primary suspect. Your name and face are spread across every possible media outlet. Your belongings have been searched and seized as evidence - right down to your mom's Tupperware. Cameras follow your every step of every day. Now imagine all of this occurs mere days after your actions actually saved lives and you were hailed as a hero across all of those same media outlets. Richard Jewell didn't have to imagine this, as he lived this nightmare in 1996.

We first see Richard (played by Paul Walter Hauser in one of the year's best performances) as a supply clerk at a law firm in 1986. His awkward ways and surprising efficiency catches the eye of attorney Watson Bryant (Oscar winner Sam Rockwell), a quasi-connection that comes into play a decade later. We then jump ahead those 10 years to find Richard being fired from his campus security job at a college due to his over-zealous focus on protocol. Fortunately for Richard, the Olympics are coming to Atlanta, so finding work as a security guard is pretty easy.

Atlanta's Centennial Olympic Park is shown with crowds of people cheering at a Kenny Rogers and later dancing the Macarena. As one of the on-site security guards, Richard spots a suspicious backpack that turns out to be holding the bomb that detonates, creating tragedy for many. As the viewing audience, we know that Richard's actions saved lives and he most definitely was not responsible for planting the bomb. And it's that knowing that places us as close as possible to the Richard Jewell experience.

Four-time Oscar winner Clint Eastwood directs yet another story of a working-class hero. Only this time, he blatantly calls out what he sees as two evil forces: the U.S. Government (the FBI) and the media. Billy Ray (CAPTAIN PHILLIPS, SHATTERED GLASS) based his script on the 1997 Vanity Fair article "American Nightmare: The Ballad of Richard Jewell" by Marie Brenner (who also wrote the article that was the source for THE INSIDER, 1999). It can be argued that Eastwood comes down hard on the FBI and the media, but you might consider putting yourself in Richard Jewell's shoes before crying foul.

Jon Hamm has perfected the role of cocksure FBI agent and here he plays Tom Shaw as the man totally focused on proving Richard Jewell was the perpetrator. Much has been made of Eastwood's depiction of Atlanta Journal-Constitution reporter Kathy Scruggs (played by Olivia Wilde, who directed this year's surprise hit BOOKSMART). It's a bit curious that the uproar is over what some interpret as a reporter trading intimate relations for a scoop, yet Eastwood's contempt seems focused more on the idea of trying a citizen's case in public ... while lacking any real evidence outside of a profile. The reporter (Ms. Scruggs passed away in 2001) is certainly portrayed as an ultra-aggressive reporter desperate for a headline story, but the implied consensual affair occurred after the inside information was provided - and the FBI agent was actually surprised... "Is this really going to happen?" Perhaps the viewer reaction to this is a sign of the times, but I'm guessing if any one of Eastwood's critics were similarly falsely accused (as Jewell), the fictionalized version of the reporter would be less important than having the truth discovered. Of course, this could have been easily avoided had the name of the reporter been changed for the film.

Two key supporting roles come courtesy of Oscar winner Kathy Bates as Richard's mother Bobi, and Nina Arianda as Watson Bryant's paralegal. Ms. Bates starts out as a loving and simple mother to Richard, but her press conference captures the character in a new light. It's a strong and heartfelt performance. Ms. Arianda brings some warmth sprinkled with welcome sarcasm to her role. Mr. Hauser is spot-on in every scene, and when these four are all together, it's a pleasure to watch. Hauser and Rockwell are especially good in their scenes together as the 'wronged man' contrasted with the take-no-guff attorney.

Every time Richard says "I'm law enforcement too", it's heart-breaking to us and an opening for the FBI to manipulate him. The profile of a single white male living at home with his mom, carrying gung-ho dreams of a career in law enforcement, while collecting guns and knowledge on bombs and police procedure, made Richard Jewell seem like the kind of guy who would do something for attention. However, the film and the true story both emphasize the danger of prematurely persecuting individuals - especially in public. These days the race is always about who is first with a story, rather than who is right. A rush to judgment can be seen as an abuse of power, whether it's by the media, a law enforcement agency, or folks on social media. At this stage of his career, director Eastwood seems more interested in telling stories than showing one. He offers up little visual artistry outside of the terrific performances, but this story ... it's a doozy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-13","keywords":"trial by media,media bias,false accusation,scapegoat,atlanta georgia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1837612825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE4Mjk4YjgtOWQ3Yy00YTY2LTgxMWYtNWI4OWFlMmY4ZDEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE4Mjk4YjgtOWQ3Yy00YTY2LTgxMWYtNWI4OWFlMmY4ZDEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The World Will Know His Name and the Truth"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3236159/","name":"Paul Walter Hauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005377/","name":"Sam Rockwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10263413/","name":"Brandon Stanley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000142/","name":"Clint Eastwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0509662/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712753/","name":"Billy Ray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107493/","name":"Marie Brenner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7471755/","name":"Kent Alexander"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fighting with My Family
Na ringu z rodziną
Fighting with My Family
programme.desc:
Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Rating 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74093,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"jock strap on head,giving birth,young female lead,brother sister relationship,wrestling","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6513120, Title: Fighting with My Family, --- Description: Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek","dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

programme.title: The Browning Version
Wersja Browninga
The Browning Version
programme.desc:
The Browning Version: Directed by Mike Figgis. With Albert Finney, Greta Scacchi, Matthew Modine, Julian Sands. On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109340/","name":"The Browning Version","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk1ZTMxN2EtZWNjNy00NDg2LWEzYmItNTlhMmNmODNiMGZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murli786"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb!!","reviewBody":"Albert Finney and Greta Scacchi have given a fabulous performance. Indeed this is a rare gem in cinema. I give this 9 out of 10. The script is tight, the music score good and the performances are amazing.

Its a simple story of a school teacher who is forced to retire. He finds no comfort in his retirement as he is denied his pension and there is absolutely no one in the school who is sad to see him go. Living with an unfaithful life, this school teacher lives a lonely life. Never to bow down to anyone and nor letting anyone sympathise with him, he portrays a classic and rare case of a strong human being.

As i say this, it was sad to see him break down when a kid showers him a rare gift of love. If this movie does not touch your soul or move you, then you truly belong to the cold hearted. Keep a handkerchief ready.

Please watch this movie. It is a masterpiece .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3205,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1994-10-28","keywords":"preparatory school,teacher student relationship,school faculty,retirement,boarding school","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000627/","name":"Greta Scacchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000546/","name":"Matthew Modine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001214/","name":"Mike Figgis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052233/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711905/","name":"Terence Rattigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Platzspitzbaby
Dziewczynka z Parku Igieł
Platzspitzbaby
programme.desc:
Platzspitzbaby: Directed by Pierre Monnard. With Jerry Hoffmann, Sarah Spale, Luna Mwezi, Michael Schertenleib. Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9737798/","name":"Platzspitzbaby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIzZWM5MWUtZTZjNS00NmQ4LTljODktMmQ0Mjc2YzRkMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU1ODM0NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9737798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fxOCR"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing","reviewBody":"Made an account here on IMDB, just to recommend this movie. Apparently only ONE other recommended this? This is one of the best movies I've watched in a long time. I stumbled upon this movie by chance, and decided to give it a try. It was very much worth it!! I haven't watched any Swiss film before, at least to my knowledge?

It's absolutely amazing. The acting from both Sarah Spale and Luna Mwezi is sublime and extremely believable. At times it's really hard to get through, since the story revolving around Mia and her mom is very sad and somewhat depressing. The daily struggle of the daughter Mia, trying to help her mother, is very touching, although very sad.

I had to stop the movie a few times, just to get a break. Definitely cried through a lot of the tough scenes. I had to remind myself it's "just" a movie, but it felt very real.

Anyways, if you get a chance to watch this movie - I thoroughly recommend you should.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-18","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,coming of age,drug addicted woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Platzspitzbaby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1005371161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3768173/","name":"Jerry Hoffmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1282623/","name":"Sarah Spale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457412/","name":"Luna Mwezi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1301190/","name":"Pierre Monnard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1825205/","name":"André Küttel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457413/","name":"Michelle Halbheer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11979752/","name":"Franziska K. IMDb data; ttnr: 9737798, Title: Platzspitzbaby, --- Description: Platzspitzbaby: Directed by Pierre Monnard. With Jerry Hoffmann, Sarah Spale, Luna Mwezi, Michael Schertenleib. Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9737798/","name":"Platzspitzbaby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIzZWM5MWUtZTZjNS00NmQ4LTljODktMmQ0Mjc2YzRkMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU1ODM0NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9737798/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"fxOCR","dateCreated":"2020-12-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing","reviewBody":"Made an account here on IMDB, just to recommend this movie. Apparently only ONE other recommended this? This is one of the best movies I've watched in a long time. I stumbled upon this movie by chance, and decided to give it a try. It was very much worth it!! I haven't watched any Swiss film before, at least to my knowledge?

It's absolutely amazing. The acting from both Sarah Spale and Luna Mwezi is sublime and extremely believable. At times it's really hard to get through, since the story revolving around Mia and her mom is very sad and somewhat depressing. The daily struggle of the daughter Mia, trying to help her mother, is very touching, although very sad.

I had to stop the movie a few times, just to get a break. Definitely cried through a lot of the tough scenes. I had to remind myself it's "just" a movie, but it felt very real.

Anyways, if you get a chance to watch this movie - I thoroughly recommend you should.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-18","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,coming of age,drug addicted woman","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Platzspitzbaby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1005371161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3768173/","name":"Jerry Hoffmann","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1282623/","name":"Sarah Spale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457412/","name":"Luna Mwezi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1301190/","name":"Pierre Monnard"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075448/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1825205/","name":"André Küttel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457413/","name":"Michelle Halbheer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11979752/","name":"Franziska K. programme.title: Kerosin
Nafta
Kerosin
programme.desc: Kerosin: Directed by Yusup Razykov. With Valeri Maslov, Evgenija Molotova, Inna Stepanova, Elena Susanina. The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10146198/","name":"Kerosin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc1MzA1YmUtOTBjNS00ZmZiLWE0NGMtYmZmZTVlYjA2YzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10146198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"from Porozhin","reviewBody":"Porozhin is a Russian village, like many others. One its people, an old woman, preserving the memory of his late husband, being happy when her daughter and granddaughter visits her, having need of a little pig in a sort of version of Pig story by Ion Creanga , punishing the killers of her granddaughter in a manner remembering The Virgin Spring by Ingmar Bergman , having the chance than a rich man being very generous with her. A film about Russia more than about a venerable woman. Beautiful in a sense than only by the Easterns can be understand, maybe defined. A story with mythical embroideries about lonely life, survive, injustice and a form of profound peace. Maybe, an useful testimony. Sure, a beautiful film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":110,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-03-26","keywords":"loyalty","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400286/","name":"Valeri Maslov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11400285/","name":"Evgenija Molotova"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3756556/","name":"Inna Stepanova"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0713689/","name":"Yusup Razykov"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0713689/","name":"Yusup Razykov"}],"duration":"PT1H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Lemony Snicket: Seria niefortunnych zdarzeń
Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: A Series of Unfortunate Events: Directed by Brad Silberling. With Jim Carrey, Liam Aiken, Emily Browning, Kara Hoffman. When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0339291/","name":"A Series of Unfortunate Events","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDM4NTg0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjI4MTczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0339291/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colonel_green"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bleakly funny.","reviewBody":"Before entering the theatre, I'd never glanced at any of the "Lemony Snicket" books. I'd never even heard of them. Having seen the film, I'll make it a priority to take a look. The film has a strong "Harry Potter" feel, what with the heroic, much put-upon British children, and the fantastical setting. If J.K. Rowling had cast Lord Voldemort as a nefarious villain out to steal the Potter family fortune, and made Ron and Hermione Harry's siblings, I imagine it would look something like this. Jim Carrey swallows huge chunks of scenery in his portrayal of Count Olaf, one of the most despicable villains to grace the silver screen in a while. The four child actors are all superb, especially the very attractive Emily Browning as the inventor, Violet. The film comes with a wonderfully disturbing climax, and a enjoyably happy epilogue that hints at many future misfortunes for the Baudelaire children. I'll be there. 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201268,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2005-04-13","keywords":"children,dark comedy,orphan,steampunk,uncle niece relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi513147161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797869/","name":"Brad Silberling"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330565/","name":"Robert Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1274516/","name":"Daniel Handler"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last and First Men
Ostatni i pierwsi ludzie
Last and First Men
programme.desc: Last and First Men: Directed by Jóhann Jóhannsson. With Tilda Swinton. Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8015444/","name":"Last and First Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkYWQ1OGItOTRhMi00MzIyLTk4Y2UtNzE1M2JhNmZjMmZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjU5NTg5NzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two billion years ahead of us, a future race of humans finds itself on the verge of extinction. Almost all that is left in the world are lone and surreal monuments, beaming their message into the wilderness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8015444/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"majorbonobo"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful posthumous work by Jóhann Jóhannsson","reviewBody":"This is a beautiful art/science/philosophy installation music film by Icelandic composer Jóhann Jóhannsson released after his death in 2018, from a haunting text by the British philosopher and writer Olaf Stapledon, known by his "science fiction" in the first half of the 20th-Century. It's narrated by Tilda Swinton, who conveys greatly the tone of a once and future humanity (a post-humanity, if you will). The visuals are provided mostly by brutalist Soviet concrete architecture from the former Yugoslavia.\n\nApparently the film is being marketed by some quarters like some sort of kind of post-apocalyptic sci-fi pic, and apparently kids are watching it with expectations of seeing the likes of Mad Max (which is a great series of films, anyway) or Ready Player One or who knows what kind of zombie crap. This is not it, and you can then laugh at their perplexed and resentful reviews giving the film 1 star. No, nope, nope. What were they sold? This is not World War Z, nor the Time Machine. Think, if of anything, of Guy Debord's films, John Berger, Soviet films, think of Paul Virilio's Bunker Archaeology, think of the visuals and soundtrack for T. S. Eliot's serious poems (not "Cats", of course), etc. Think of Cosmos or 2001: A Space Odissey, if you want. Think of a documentary. Think of a museum exhibit. Think of a manifesto for post-humanity. Think of archaeology in 2 Billion AD... but for Pete's sake, when you get into watching this film, stop thinking you are entering a McDonald's or a Chuck E. Cheese when you come in into The Met or a Guggenheim museum."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Fantasy","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-09-21","keywords":"mankind,human race,future,past,dystopia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1567145497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU0MjM1MGYtOWQwYi00NWQ3LTllM2UtNGJhYTIwODAxZTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU0MjM1MGYtOWQwYi00NWQ3LTllM2UtNGJhYTIwODAxZTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0433580/","name":"Jóhann Jóhannsson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046271/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9633799/","name":"Olaf Stapledon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0433580/","name":"Jóhann Jóhannsson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10986200/","name":"José Enrique Macián"}],"duration":"PT1H10M"}</script><metacontent="

Pusta widownia
An Audience of Chairs
programme.desc: An Audience of Chairs: Directed by Deanne Foley. With Carolina Bartczak, Peter MacNeill, Gord Rand, Edie Inksetter. A mother living with mental illness struggles to cope after losing custody of her two daughters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6980962/","name":"An Audience of Chairs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmJjODQ3YjItOGExYy00Mjc5LWIyMTItYWI3ZTZiNGM3NGYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTcwMDExOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mother living with mental illness struggles to cope after losing custody of her two daughters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6980962/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ihatebadmoviescom"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fascinating look at mental illness and how it affects families","reviewBody":"While the topic of mental illness has been portrayed countless times in cinema I think this is one of the better films that I have seen about the illness. Some may take hope as the silver lining in the movie but I see it a little bit different. With a little bit of help and a lot of empathy it seems that we could be helping people in real and meaningful ways. I thoroughly enjoyed the film and got a bit teary-eyed in the last acts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-24","keywords":"mother","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"An Audience of Chairs","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4237803289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZiYzA5ZmYtMjQ5My00ODIxLWEzOTAtNTgxMmI1ODIyOTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZiYzA5ZmYtMjQ5My00ODIxLWEzOTAtNTgxMmI1ODIyOTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3846494/","name":"Carolina Bartczak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534132/","name":"Peter MacNeill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1658533/","name":"Gord Rand"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2676587/","name":"Deanne Foley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075779/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0584014/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396698/","name":"Rosemary House"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Platzspitzbaby
Dziewczynka z Parku Igieł
Platzspitzbaby
programme.desc:
Platzspitzbaby: Directed by Pierre Monnard. With Jerry Hoffmann, Sarah Spale, Luna Mwezi, Michael Schertenleib. Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9737798/","name":"Platzspitzbaby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIzZWM5MWUtZTZjNS00NmQ4LTljODktMmQ0Mjc2YzRkMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU1ODM0NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9737798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fxOCR"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing","reviewBody":"Made an account here on IMDB, just to recommend this movie. Apparently only ONE other recommended this? This is one of the best movies I've watched in a long time. I stumbled upon this movie by chance, and decided to give it a try. It was very much worth it!! I haven't watched any Swiss film before, at least to my knowledge?

It's absolutely amazing. The acting from both Sarah Spale and Luna Mwezi is sublime and extremely believable. At times it's really hard to get through, since the story revolving around Mia and her mom is very sad and somewhat depressing. The daily struggle of the daughter Mia, trying to help her mother, is very touching, although very sad.
